translations: 亚北极的；亚北极区的；靠近北极的

sentences.sentence: Subarctic temperatures will force us underground for a billion years.
sentences.translation: 到那个时候我们就要在地下住好几十亿年呢！

sentences.sentence: I got a brief glimpse of the situation of Sweden's modern Sami when I visited subarctic town of lulea a few weeks ago.
sentences.translation: 几星期前我拜访了北极附近的吕勒奥，得以对现代的瑞典萨米人有所了解。

sentences.sentence: The relationships between the distributions of forest limit and subarctic coniferous trees and WI were examined in detail.
sentences.translation: 利用一些树种的分布资料，进一步论证了森林上限及亚寒带针叶林的分布与WI间的关系。
